trans-unit.resname: PW12·79 | Gather the Townsfolk | Card Name
PW12·79 | Gather the Townsfolk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.\nFateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, create five of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1白色人类衍生生物放进战场。命悬一刻～如果你的生命为5或更少，则改为将五个上述的衍生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PW12·81 | Curse of Thirst | Card Name
PW12·81 | Curse of Thirst | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant player\nAt the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to them.
trans-unit.target: 在所结附之牌手的维持开始时，每有一个诅咒结附于该牌手，CARDNAME便对该牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PW12·82 | Nearheath Stalker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 不息（当此生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）
